name: Funky's
description:
Funky’s is the place to chill in Mayrhofen! Drop by for a yummy pizza, one of our delicious pastas or our famous kebabs after a day on the piste Our relaxed atmosphere and funky tunes will have you in chill mode in no time. Funky food, funky drinks, funky friends.  Free WiFi and no hassels.

See you soon!
